ada shri lankawe pawathinne janadhipathiwaranayak pamanak nowa nidahas janda balaya, mudala saha prachandathwaya wisin awasana washayen yatapath kara ganimata rajapakshawarun wisin darana maranthika uthsahaya parajaya kirime satanayi.

siyalloma eyin panaya kalaha. 24 thawada un wahanse owunta katha kota, ”meya boho dena wenuwen waguruwanu labana mage giwisum-rudhiraya we. 25 sabawin ma mama obata kiyami, dewiyan wahansege rajyayehi di mama nawatha midiyusa panaya karana dinaya ena thek, mama me midiyusa yalith panaya nokarannemi”yi wadala seka. 26 owhu githayak gaya oliwa kandata nikma giyaha.

maharagama, nawinne sunil shantha mahatha wisin yomu karana lada lipiyak asurini.kagalle chandimala jayawardhana mahathmiya wisin yomu karana lada lipiyak asurin ikuth janawari thun wani da ‘silumina’ nelumwile pala wu ‘sampathdayakayano’ lipiyata adala athurugiriye sampath mahatha ge lipinaya ha durakathana ankaya illa pataka amathum labemin thibe.adala pudgalaya ge ekangathawakin thora wa paudgalika durakathana ankayak pala kirima gatalusahagatha men ma madhya sadacharayata patahani da we.eheyin sampath mahatha me thaththwaya therum gena thama prathicharaya kadinamin ‘nelumwila, silumina, lekhawus, kolambaa’ yana lipinayata likhithawa ho 2429265 (semali mahathmiya) ankayata wachika wa ho dakwanne nam manawi.-

jathika awashyathawa sapuralimata sahal me.to. eklaksha dasadahasak pitaratin genwimata sidu wiya.ese pawathi awadiyaka pohora sahanadharaya pirinamima nisath uthuru nagenahira gowibimwala nawatha wi wagawa arambaima nisath 2005 sita 2009 dakwa kalaya thula jathika wi nishpadanaya sapura ganimata hakiyawa labini.shri lankawe janagahanayen siyayata 70k tharam wana gramiya janathawage pradhana jiwanopaya margaya krushikarmanthaya wana bawin aanduwa me pohora sahanadharaya labadimata kriya kala bawa aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha dinaminata prakasha kaleya.wasara 2005 nowambar 17 wanida pawathi janadhipathiwaranayen jayagath janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage upades matha me sahanadhara wadapiliwela aarambha kala bawa sihipath kala basil rajapaksha mahatha me sahanadharayak nowa anagatha aayojanayak lesa aanduwa salakana bawada kiya.wasara 2010 sita rata sahalin swayanposhitha wimath samanga sahal pitarata yawime jathika wadapiliwela kara rata sudanam kota athayi me pilibandawa dinaminata adahas dakwamin gowijana sewa saha wanajiwi amathi es. em. chandrasena mahatha kiya sitiyeya.athiriktha sahal apanayanaya kirime kalapa 4k hadina gena athayi ki amathiwaraya dakunu rajarata nagenahira ha uthuru palath padaka kota kriyathmaka karana bawada wisthara kaleya.rasayanika pohora gowi janathawata labadimata amatharawa owun kabanika pohora yoda ganimin gowithanata huru kirimatada aanduwa wadapiliwelak yedu bawada chandrasena mahatha sandahan kaleya.wasara 2005 di wi gowinta labadun pohora sahanadharaya me wana wita the athireka boga sandahada labadimata aanduwa katayuthu kala bawada gowijana sewa ha wanajiwi amathiwaraya kiya.
wanchawak siddha wi athi bawath wanchawa wasa ganima sandaha agamathithuma jathiya amathu bawath janatha wimukthi peramune nayaka anura kumara disanayaka mahatha pawasayi.

wanachiwi sampath sanrakshana amathyanshaya eyata anubaddha wanachiwi sanrakshana departhamenthuwa ha wanachiwi bharaya yana aayathana wala aramunu ha karyabharaya itu kirima ha upayogi kara ganna sampath mana kalamanakarithwayen ha rachaye anapanath, chakrelkha, mulya regulasi, aayathana sangrahaya yana widhi widhana walata anukulawa sidu wanneda yanna pariksha kara bala ee pilibada nirikshana ha nirdesha chyeshta kalamanakarithwayata idiripath kirimath mema aayathanayanhi siduwana dushana, wishamachara kriya akramikathawan pilibada wimarshanaya kara wimarshana wartha idiripath kirimath abhyanthara wiganana ha wimarshana anshaye aramuna we.

diya rahitha bawa (nirudaka), kamaya (madhawa) ha sundarathwaya (sundari) athara gatuma mehi sankethawath kere.
ehi sanyuthiya ha adhika pramanayak bhawitha bhawithaya dirgha bhawithaya samaga ewani asathmikatha, kasima, dawena aprasanna prathikriya athi wiya hakiya.
rajaye sewakayinge ha siyalu rakiyawanhi niratha podu janathawage samuhika kapawimayi.

minisa siya wimukthiya sandaha karana siya aragalaye ohuta ee sandaha kriyakari wimata nam, palamuwa thama pragdhanaye ‘‘wahalek’’ bawata path wi athi bawath ema wahala bhawayen midimata thama wani ma anek aya samaga ek wi satan kala yuthu bawath awabodha kara ganima aniwaryaya kondesiyak we.
sthriya sathutu kala haki, sathutu kala nohaki, upakramayen sathutu kala haki yanuwen mema porondama, kotas thunakata warga kere.
loke aayurwedaya, wagema batahira waidya widyawa me siyallama mulinma aushadha lesa bhawitha kale shakha.
me durbhikshaye tharama koyitharam da kiwwoth pan kallak ganna polimwala hitapu minissu adagena watuna.
me aakarayata gab ganimak thahawuru karaganimen pasu oba waidyawarayeku wetha yomu wi adala upades laba gatha yuthuyi.
eeth ithin deyiyange pihiten mans giya wagema kelin aapahu aawalu.
ee kiyanne yam wimansawak thiyanawa nam ee nisa sithe samadhiyak athi wenawa.
shri lankawata niranthara pida gena dena wyasanayak lesa ganwathura, nayayam ha kunatu dakwiya hakiya.
